PackageOracle.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_OFFERING
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_OFFERING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.049853000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_start_dt IN DATE
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_end_dt IN DATE
,subscription_offering_qty IN NUMBER
,subscription_qty_chrg_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_start_dt IN DATE
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_subscription_offering;

body.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_OFFERING
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_OFFERING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.060208000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_start_dt IN DATE
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_end_dt IN DATE
,subscription_offering_qty IN NUMBER
,subscription_qty_chrg_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_offering.add, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || subscription_offering_start_dt || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || subscription_offering_end_dt || '|' || subscription_offering_qty || '|' || subscription_qty_chrg_amt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_subscription_offering a
(
a.offering_id
,a.subscription_offering_start_dt
,a.subscription_id
,a.subscription_offering_end_dt
,a.subscription_offering_qty
,a.subscription_qty_chrg_amt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.offering_id
,add.subscription_offering_start_dt
,add.subscription_id
,add.subscription_offering_end_dt
,add.subscription_offering_qty
,add.subscription_qty_chrg_amt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_offering.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_offering_start_dt IN DATE
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_offering.del, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || subscription_offering_start_dt || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_subscription_offering a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.offering_id = del.offering_id
AND a.subscription_offering_start_dt = del.subscription_offering_start_dt
AND a.subscription_id = del.subscription_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_offering.del');

END del;

END da_subscription_offering;
